login.loginSubtitle: Please enter your information to continue.
login.errorPasswordMinLength: The password must be at least 8 characters long.

createAccount.title: Create your account
createAccount.errorPhoneInvalid: Please enter a valid phone number.
createAccount.errorPasswordMinLength: The password must be at least 8 characters long.

forgotPassword.Title: Forgot Password
forgotPassword.subTitle: We will send a verification code to your registered email.
forgotPassword.rateLimitWarningMessage: You have only {{remaining}} attempt(s) left before being blocked.
forgotPassword.rateLimitBlockedMessage: You exceeded the maximum number of attempts. Please wait {{minutes}} minutes before trying again.
forgotPassword.rateLimitStillBlockedMessage: You still need to wait {{minutes}} minutes before trying again.

validateCode.cardSubTitle: An email with the code has been sent to you.

emailAlreadyRegistered.title: This email is already registered.
emailAlreadyRegistered.message: This email is already registered. Please try another or sign in.

internalServerError.title: Internal Server Error
internalServerError.message: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.

invalidCredentials.title: Invalid Credentials
invalidCredentials.message: Incorrect email or password. Please try again.

userNotFound.title: Email Not Registered
userNotFound.message: This email is not associated with any account.

phoneAlreadyRegistered.title: Phone Already Registered
phoneAlreadyRegistered.message: This phone number is already associated with an existing account.

noConnectionApi.title: No Connection
noConnectionApi.message: Could not connect. Check your internet or try again later.

invalidOrExpiredCode.title: Invalid or Expired Code
invalidOrExpiredCode.message: The code is invalid or has already expired. Request a new one.

noResetCodeFound.title: No Code Found
noResetCodeFound.message: No valid reset code was found for this user.

passwordResetEmailSent.title: Email Sent
passwordResetEmailSent.message: Check your email for the reset code.

emailCodeSent.title: Code Sent
emailCodeSent.message: The recovery code has been sent to your email.

emailSend.title: Email Sent
emailSend.message: Your email was sent successfully! Check your inbox and spam folder.

passwordResetCodeVerified.title: Code Verified
passwordResetCodeVerified.message: The code has been successfully validated. You can now reset your password.
